name: Protocol Zero
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Protocol Zero is the first Ethereum abstracted ecosystem built by and for traders. Protocol Zero allows users to pay gas fees in any ERC20 token instead of just Eth. As well introducing an eth-less portfolio manager built on the back end of the Zerion API, the primary goal is to decrease friction in the overall user experience of every day traders.
